title: ambaa paramEswari
sahitya:
amba paramEswari niRai 
anbAl emai Adari � jagadamba                          


anupallavi

lambOdara gaNapatiyum guhanum tozhum 
sAmbhavi jagan mOhini jagadamba
                  

caraNam

daraNi tannil piRanda kAraNa kAriyangaL 
terindu teLiyum munnE pirindiDum Avi enRE 
uNarndu urugum nenjcam 
tanil amarndE tanjcam tandaruL shiva ranjani jagadamba
